title: Frontend engineer
aboutMe: Frontend engineer with strong expertise in TypeScript, focused on building user-friendly, accessible, and maintainable web applications. Experienced with Angular, React and exploring Flutter mobile app development out of personal interest, with a passion for creating reusable components, improving user experience, and delivering high-quality, scalable code.

skills.title: Personal
list: Curious & eager to understand how things work

experience.description: Built Angular web applications for open banking payments, user profiles, and customer dashboards, emphasizing accessibility, UX, and testability; also work on a Flutter mobile app for iOS and Android. Contributed to some backend Java maintenance.
Managed parts inventory and distribution, supported technicians and customers, and handled requests through internal service applications.

Developed web applications using Angular and RxJS, integrating them with REST APIs for a platform offering health and wellness treatments. Improved user experience by implementing clear, intuitive user flows and functional UI features.
Built responsive websites for small local businesses using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Worked directly with clients to understand their needs and deliver functional, user-friendly pages.
Coordinated air freight transportation from international locations to Lithuania.

education.description: Focused on modern frontend frameworks and tools, including TypeScript, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, and Node.js.

education.placeName: Vilnius Law and Business College, Vilnius, Lithuania
education.description: Focused on financial management, investment analysis, and accounting fundamentals.
